official_title: Efficacy and Safety of 0.25% Timolol Gel in Healing Surgical Open Wounds: A Randomized Controlled Trial

exclusion_criteria:
1. Age less than 18 years of age

5. Any hypersensitivity with use of 0.25% timolol gel
